data.name: ForeVR Cornhole
data.description:
This year.... summer lasts ForeVR!

Pick from 50+ unique bags and boards, with classic and creative designs to suit each cornholer! 

Experience our custom beanbag physics, tailored for all throws and strategies, and optimized for realism. 

Immerse yourself in five stunning halls, with more to come!

Rock out to your favorite music and playlists using our YouTube-powered media player, with full multiplayer sync coming soon! 

🌽 50+ unique bags & boards to cornhole your way
🌽 5 Halls
🌽 Challengeable NPC Pros in each Hall
🌽 YouTube-powered jukebox
🌽 Private & quick match multiplayer
🌽 1v1 or 2v2 team battles

Bags, sack toss, dummy boards, doghouse, beanbag toss… no matter what you call it, it’s surely the world’s greatest lawn game. ForeVR Cornhole is the best (and first!) cornhole game for VR!

ForeVR Cornhole v1.1.0.559 brings changes and improvements to the game, and a brand-new game mode: Hall Tour!
 
WHAT’S NEW
🌽 Hall Tour mode in California Dreamin’!
🌽 Media Share! Hosts in a multiplayer party can now share their jukebox media with others.
🌽 Faster Quick Match matchmaking
🌽 Sped-up bot throwing and improved difficulty
🌽 Miscellaneous bug fixes and under-the-hood improvements 

HALL TOUR
Hall Tour is cornhole with a fresh twist. In this game mode, you’ll throw beanbags from different random locations all around the hall, avoiding obstacles! Right now, this is only available in California Dreamin’—give it a shot.
 
EARLY ACCESS: MEDIA SHARE
Now, the host in a party has the option to share their media, and other players have the option to individually accept the host’s invitation. 
 
Please be aware that this feature is in early access, so we’re still ironing out some bugs. We’re currently aware of some issues, like: 
- If an ad plays before a video, the video will be out-of-sync until the host changes the video
- Some text may clip out of buttons in certain languages
 
❓ Need help, or have a bug to report? Contact our support team at help.forevrgames.com!

Howdy, cornholers! Version 1.1 of ForeVR Cornhole brings a ton of new features, including:

🌽 New, exclusive bags & boards for ForeVR VIPs! Check out our developer post for more information.
🌽 New and improved scoreboard UI!
🌽 More voice-over lines when events (like throwing a cornhole) are triggered
🌽 Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements

Need help? Submit a ticket and get in touch with our team! 
🌽 help.forevrgames.com

Welcome to ForeVR Cornhole! 🌽

On behalf of the entire team at ForeVR Games, we’re thrilled for you to play our newest title and experience everyone’s favorite lawn game, now in VR. 
Check out all our favorite features:

🌽 Challenge in-game NPC pros in single-player mode
🌽 Play 1v1 or 2v2 multiplayer against your friends in Private Multiplayer, or try out Quick Match to play with cornholers around the world
🌽 Play to 11 or 21 points
🌽 Listen to your favorite tunes on our YouTube-powered jukebox
🌽 Unlock 50+ custom bean bags and boards to add to your arsenal
🌽 Experience five halls: ForeVR 90s Arcade, California Dreamin’, Brooklyn Rooftop, Cosmic Cornhole, and the VCL Arena
🌽 Pass and Play with family and friends at home

Toss, throw, and lob your hearts out, cornholers! Please consider leaving us a review—we’d really appreciate your feedback!

❗ Need help, or have a bug to report? Contact our support team at help.forevrgames.com!
